item.title: Yahoo Expands Content Marketing Offerings with Yahoo Storytellers
item.description:
Yahoo Expands Content Marketing Offerings with Yahoo Storytellers

SUNNYVALE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Yahoo! Inc. ( YHOO) announced today the launch of Yahoo Storytellers, a full service content marketing studio for brands and agencies that leverages Yahoo's editorial expertise, extensive data, and native advertising through Yahoo Gemini. Now marketers can leverage Yahoo Storytellers to successfully develop, distribute and measure premium branded content that meets consumers' high expectations and drives engagement.

item.title: Google Changes SERP Title and Description Length
item.description:
Google Changes SERP Title and Description Length

Published Under Search Engine Optimization by Michael Hodgdon Trying to say as much as you can about your business and its products or service in a few short words is not an easy task. You want to grab attention, but you don't want to leave out any information you think could be a 'make it or break it' for CTR and conversions.

item.title: Google Adds Social Media Icons & Links to Local Knowledge Panel
item.description:
Google Adds Social Media Icons & Links to Local Knowledge Panel

Facebook Twitter Google+ Pinterest LinkedIn Email WhatsApp Evernote SMSIf you are a local business, you will want to check your local knowledge panel - Google is now displaying social media icons and links in their local knowledge panel. These are similar to the ones Google shows in the knowledge panel for big brands.

item.title: The Design School's Ultimate Guide to Designing With Backgrounds [With Ready-to-Use Templates]
item.description:
The Design School's Ultimate Guide to Designing With Backgrounds [With Ready-to-Use Templates]

Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as to accomplish a particular purpose. - Charles Eames In order to arrange your design, you need a place to start. Backgrounds are the foundation of your graphics - it helps pave the path to forming a successful composition.
